projects.title: CsTimer - Rubik's Cube Timer
projects.description: This web app is a clone of a rubik's cube timer app with full auth features such as reset password and confirmation email.It is a highly interactive web app with lots of features such as scrambles for different puzzle types 3x3,2x2,4x4 up to 7x7.It also has charts to show your progess of your solve times.
